Example.Description: This example show how both the compile and the makeLambda functions create an Lambda.

Syntax.Hints: Normal Analytic Information Server strings are passed to lisp, whose output is passed to compile. This allows the use of alternate language parsers, and alternate macro preprocessors with the Analytic Information Server optimizing compiler.
